title: Garage Sale 4.0.6 k UB
description:
Are you sick and tired of creating auctions using eBay&#039;s slow web site? Have you been waiting patiently for a quality, affordable listing utility for the Mac OS for years? Here comes your deliverance: Ladies and Gentlemen, we&#039;re pleased to announce the arrival of GarageSale. (Your auction experience is about to change for the better...)

GarageSale is a slick, full-featured client application for the eBay online auction system. With GarageSale Mac OS X users can finally compose eye-catching auctions quickly using an intuitive Mac-like interface. (And in the fraction of the time it would take to do it on eBay&#039;s web interface.) Not only this, but GarageSale also integrates perfectly with iPhoto, offers WYSIWYG text editing and comes with over 130 free design templates.



Features:

Free Image Serving
Store up to ten auction images free of charge on our servers and say &#039;Goodbye&#039; to eBay&#039;s image hosting fees. (Learn More) 	

124 Unique Listing Designs
Enhance your listing with one of 124 listing designs. With each of them you can change how images and description are laid out - giving you more than 1000 unique possibilities. Of course you can also create your own design! Preview the included designs here. (Learn More)

Built-in Scheduler
Start your auctions anytime you want to - WITHOUT paying extra. (Learn More) 	

iPhoto integration
Access your iPhoto library directly from within GarageSale. No more copying, pasting or exporting each individual picture from iPhoto. It just works!

Powerful Messaging System
Send messages to your buyers using customizable templates with just a few clicks via eBay&#039;s message system or Apple Mail. (Learn More) 	

FTP and .Mac Image Serving
Upload as many images as you like to your web server via FTP or WebDAV or use your .Mac account without paying image hosting fees to eBay. (Learn More)

eBay Store Support
Use GarageSale to upload items to your eBay Store. (Learn More) 	

Fair Licensing
We don&#039;t treat our customers like criminals. No machine ID checking and no phoning home each time you start up GarageSale. (Learn More)

Multiple Accounts
Use GarageSale for all of your accounts. Just select the account before uploading to eBay. (Learn More) 	

Integrated Feedback Function
Now you can leave buyer feedback without ever leaving GarageSale! (Learn More)

Built-in Image Editor
Use the new Image Editor to greatly enhance image quality (Requires Mac OS X 10.4 or higher). (Learn More) 	

eBay Motors
With GarageSale you can list cars and car parts on eBay Motors. (Learn More)

Dashboard Widget
Have a quick look at your active auctions with our new Dashboard widget (Requires Mac OS X 10.4 or later). (Learn More) 	

AppleScript Support
Bulk change auction attributes with a single click. (Learn More)

Capture Images from iSight
Connect an iSight to your Mac and capture auction images quickly. 	

Pre-Filled Items
List your items with less hassle and let eBay add product information for books, DVDs, CDs, games and eletronics to your auction. (Learn More)

eBay Attributes
Without attributes many people will never find your auction. 	

Offline Capability
Even when disconnected or away from the Internet you can create auctions in GarageSale and upload them when your are back online.

Integrated Auction Preview
Preview your auction as it would be appear on eBay. 	

Certified eBay API Client
GarageSale has been certified by eBay for use with its online auction system. View GarageSales entry in eBays Solutions Directory.

Intuitive interface
Use GarageSales mac-like user interface to create auctions conveniently. That means no more waiting on eBays webserver to guide you trough to several pages step by step. 	

Auction Tracking
Track your running auctions from within GarageSale. GarageSale enables you to see the current bid and bid count, the highest bidder and other information.

Direct from Camera Importer
Import images directly from your digital camera. 	

Automator
Create and upload auctions or add auction images using Automator (Requires Mac OS X 10.4 or later).

Spotlight
Search and find your auction templates with Spotlight (Requires Mac OS X 10.4 or later). 	

Growl Support
GarageSale supports the free Growl notification system to display on-screen messages whenever you receive bids or your auction finishes.
